name: Car Machine the Game DEMO
description:
finally! it's done. This is only a demo for the Car Machine Platformer game i might update it when i have the time but for now hope you enjoy it.

Car Machine's Power guide:

Red Laser - Zenatonium

Yellow Shock - Unimite

Blue Dash - Scronatonium

Green Fazing - Wickitoniuom

NOTE: this is my first platformer that took me a while to make also all music, finalized sprite work, and other ideas is done by: Chris Iddamalgoda (C.Idd the Kidd)
